name: Ext_R4_ImplementationGuide_ma_re_example
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.ImplementationGuide.manifest.resource.example[x] for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ImplementationGuide.manifest.resource.example[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImplementationGuide|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Is an example/What is this an example of?
element.definition: If true or a reference, indicates the resource is an example instance.  If a reference is present, indicates that the example is an example of the specified profile.
element.comment: `ImplementationGuide.manifest.resource.example[x]` maps to R5 `ImplementationGuide.manifest.resource.isExample`. To multiple elements in ImplementationGuide: (`ImplementationGuide.manifest.resource.isExample`, `ImplementationGuide.manifest.resource.profile`). Type `canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/StructureDefinition)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ImplementationGuide.manifest.resource.example[x]` maps to R5 `ImplementationGuide.manifest.resource.profile`. To multiple elements in ImplementationGuide: (`ImplementationGuide.manifest.resource.isExample`, `ImplementationGuide.manifest.resource.profile`). Type `boolean` has no mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
